nodes.text: QQ-463 was a scout trooper during the reign of the Galactic Empire.
Sometime after 0 BBY, QQ-463 resided in the Imperial Detainment Facility in the Imperial Fortress on Yavin 4.
In this facility, the Empire imprisoned six Rebel pilots. During the Remembrance Day festivities of the same year, Wedge Antilles employed a loyal Rebel to rescue the pilots.
The Rebel killed QQ-463 so that one of the Rebel pilots could sneak out of the base in his Scout Trooper armor.
